topic.latin: Letters Sin, Shin, Shad, Dhad Combinations

instruction_id: Berlatih membaca kombinasi huruf Sin, Shin, Shad, dan Dhad dengan fathah.
instruction_en: Practice reading combinations of Sin, Shin, Shad, and Dhad letters with fathah.
instruction_ar: تَدَرَّبْ عَلَى قِرَاءَةِ مُرَكَّبَاتِ حُرُوفِ السِّينِ وَالشِّينِ وَالصَّادِ وَالضَّادِ بِالْفَتْحَةِ.

content.latin: SA DA = SADA SYA RA = SYARA
content.arabic: سَ دَ = سَدَ    شَ رَ = شَرَ

content.latin: SHA DA = SHADA DHA RA = DHARA
content.arabic: صَ دَ = صَدَ    ضَ رَ = ضَرَ
